name: Playscii Creator Blunder
description:
On the day of 17th October 2021 (PST), Playscii creator JP LEBRETON was mad at Max Capacity for using his open-source software to create NFT on Tezos & Ethereum blockchain (DOS Punks). They blocked the DOS Punks creator on Twitter and also brought down the website with the above image listed on the landing page (http://vectorpoem.com/playscii/). This event sparked a Twitter debate on open-source software's legal usage under the MIT license. 

In response to this spark, @playscii twitter account started blocking followers' accounts which are tagging them. This event has created a history that is now going to rest on the Tezos blockchain. 

Here is the community forked version after this event -> https://github.com/squintdev/nftscii

Tweet that started this debate -> https://twitter.com/maxcapacity/status/1449888701073399810
